metadata.name: Email Exifiltration Via Powershell
metadata.comment: Detects email exfiltration via powershell cmdlets

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-pssnapin')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-recipient')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-expandproperty')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('emailaddresses')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('smtpaddress')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-hidetableheaders')))

output.summary: Detects email exfiltration via powershell cmdlets
